text.text:
ScholarOne Abstracts

2015 – 2016: Development of SholarOne Abstracts - Java Enterprise Edition application: Java 6 EE, GWT/Sencha GXT, Servlets, JSP, JSTL, EL, JavaScript, jQuery, Ajax, Bootstrap, HTML, CSS, DB2, P. ORM, JBoss, Apache, Ant. Team lead. Responsible for Development, Architecture, User Stories and Defects assignments, Code reviews, Day-to-Day Scrum meetings, Business consultancy and direct communication with USA partners - from VP Technology & App Develop of IP&Science through Project/Product managers, Architects/Staff developers to T2 support and QAs. World’s largest online scientific manuscripts and symposia abstracts systems. Over 13 millions users, 6500 organizations worldwide. Owners of Science Citation Index (SCI list). Several millions users per day.

2015 – 2016: Architecture, Development and Maintenance of SholarOne Abstracts Web Services (new project for Thompson-Reuters IP&Science SholarOne Abstracts): Java Enterprise Edition, RESTful, Apache CXF, JAX-RS, JAXB, JSON, Jackson, Spring, DB2, Proprietary ORM, Cortellis, ESTI, Apache CXF, Maven, JBoss. Team lead.

ScholarOne Abstracts is the industry’s foremost technology for abstract management, enabling an efficient workflow solution that accelerates abstract acceptance and supports the leading research presentations at scholarly meetings and conferences.

text.text:
ScholarOne Manuscripts
Resolving production defects of SholarOne Manuscripts - Java Enterprise Edition application: Java 6 EE, Servlets, JSP, JSTL, EL, JavaScript, jQuery, Ajax, Bootstrap, HTML, CSS, DB2, P. ORM, JBoss, Apache, Ant. World’s largest online scientific manuscripts peer review system. Over 13 millions users, 6500 organizations worldwide. Owners of Science Citation Index (SCI list). Several millions users per day.

ScholarOne Manuscripts is the premier journal and peer review tool for scholarly publishers and societies. It deftly balances a journal’s requirements to holistically aggregate content with an author’s inherent interest in getting published work out quickly to a professional audience.

ScholarOne Manuscripts has broad application in the marketplace, used by some of the most prestigious commercial publishers, societies, associations, and university presses in the world. Its high-level configuration delivers overviews of manuscript status and identifies bottlenecks to maximize workflow capacity.  With ScholarOne Manuscripts, you can:

Execute task assignments, email reminders, and web-based research tools automatically
Capture data and files in multiple languages and formats and create PDF and HTML proofs on the fly
Customize requirements at the journal level, including submissions questions, key words, files types, and field size limits

ScholarOne Abstracts

2017: ScholarOne AWS Migration: migration of Clarivate Analytics from Thomson-Reuters data centers to Amazon Cloud / Amazon Web Services. Code adaptation (Java EE/Java 8, WildFly, Git), DevOps, System analysis and appropriate infrastructure change. Technical designs and architecture. Team work.

text.text: Senior full stack programmer - Team lead - working as contractor for Thomson Reuters IP & Science, Charlottesville, VA, USA on multiple projects.
text.accessibilityText: Senior full stack programmer - Team lead - working as contractor for Thomson Reuters IP & Science, Charlottesville, VA, USA on multiple projects.

text.text:
Software Developer, writing and testing code, organizing work process, interaction with clients, partners and teammates.

2012 - 2014: Development of Android applications for TAXI companies in Novi Sad. Technologies: Java, Android SDK, Eclipse ADT, PhotoShop, CorelDraw. Team leader.

2012 - 2014:  Cooperation with Packt Publishing (London/Mumbai) at finding and correcting technical errors in books "Getting Started with Eclipse Juno" (Java SE/EE) and "OpenCV 2 Computer Vision Application Programming Cookbook" (C/C++/OpenCV). Team work.

2001 - 2006: Collaboration with numerous clients, most important: Winstart (Sweeden), Authorlink (USA), Crystal Images (USA), WNTC and BPComputers (Serbia). Development of web sites, server maintenance and network design (LAN and WAN).  Technologies: HTML, CSS, PHP, MySQL, JavaScript, SEO, WebCEO, DreamWeaver, FrontPage, Linux and FreeBSD servers, Plesk, Direct Admin, ISPConfig, PHPBB, Joomla, Mambo, osCommerce, Typo3, Plone/Zope, Debian, Fedora, RedHat, CentOS, HylaFAX, ISPConfig, DragonFly CMS. Numerous hardware configurations, server and desktop installations, router and other network equipment configurations. Team leader.

1992 - 2001: Collaboration with many clients concerning development of accounting software, warehouse management software etc., design of computer infrastructure, assembly and configuration of computer equipment, CAD workstations, desktop publishing, advertising materials. Technologies: BASIC, Clipper, FORTRAN, C/C++, AutoCAD, Corel Draw, PhotoStyler, PhotoShop, Ventura Publisher, Image processing, photography.

Technologies: BASIC, Clipper, FORTRAN, C/C++, AutoCAD, Corel Draw, PhotoStyler, PhotoShop, Ventura Publisher, Image processing, photography.

text.text:
Strategic Consulting, including business planning & sales strategy development. Design of IT systems including industrial equipment.

1994 - 2014: Business and technical consultant, market analysis, development of new products, and business Intelligence for Stillemans SA/NV, Brussels, Belgium. Team work.

2004 - 2014: Business consultant for market analysis and business intelligence for Roma Plastik, Istanbul, Turkey (child company of Advent International, USA; since 2012 child company of: Egger, Austria). Team work

2004 - 2008: CTO and business consultant for "Greenfield" project for polymer processing plant in Serbia. Application of numerous technologies - chemistry, mechanical engineering, electronics, informatics, programming of industrial equipment and PLCs. Cooperation with R&D laboratories: BASF (Germany), Colortonic (Germany), Thomas IDE (Germany). CTO (team: 40+).

text.text:
• Domain Architect in ABN AMRO (Netherlands).
• Solution and Technical architecture for NWB Bank (Netherlands).
• Solution and Infrastructure architecture for TD Securities (Canada).
• RFP, POC, Business Analysis and pre-sales support.
• Cloud and DevOps architecture, engineering and support.
text.accessibilityText:
• Domain Architect in ABN AMRO (Netherlands).
• Solution and Technical architecture for NWB Bank (Netherlands).
• Solution and Infrastructure architecture for TD Securities (Canada).
• RFP, POC, Business Analysis and pre-sales support.
• Cloud and DevOps architecture, engineering and support.

text.text:
• Solution and Technical architecture and DevOps support for NWB Bank (Netherlands) 
• Solution Architect for TransAmerica (USA) projects: Executive Dashboard and Electronic Document Management System. Technologies: Java, .NET/C# Azure, Web, Angular 8, Microservices, Serverless and Cloud based solutions  - AWS and Azure. Both with Greenfield and Brownfield projects.
• Point of Contact regarding information and requirements gathering.
• Participating and influencing the Technical flow decision making.
• Managing all specific requests/functional issues and modifications in project specific code.
• Creating POC using JHipster framework built on Java 8 SE, Spring, Hibernate on the server side, MySQL Database and Angular 7.
• Tutoring younger developers, organizing bench training sessions, preparing developers for technical interviews. Development and design of user interfaces using Angular, TypeScript, HTML, JSP, CSS, Bootstrap. Using DevOps tools such as Jenkins, Jira, GitLab, Open Project.

• Creating POC using JHipster framework built on Java 8 SE, Spring, Hibernate on the server side, MySQL Database and Angular 7.
• Tutoring younger developers, organizing bench training sessions, preparing developers for technical interviews. Development and design of user interfaces using Angular, TypeScript, HTML, JSP, CSS, Bootstrap. Using DevOps tools such as Jenkins, Jira, GitLab, Open Project.

text.text:
• Delivery and Technical management of local and remote teams in Serbia and India: 20+ developers across 5 teams.
• Delivery manager for clients: MSCI (USA, Hungary) and Atria Wealth Solutions (USA). Team of 10+ people.
• Efficient communication with several USA and European clients.
• Taking part in business development, controlling, organization and negotiations.
• In charge of planning and organizing working activities on the project.
• Assuring high performance and permanent improvement of the team.
• Managing technical interviews, onboarding processes of new team members, defining staffing and rotation strategies.

text.text: Managing 20+ developers across 5 teams while keeping focus on business and architectural aspect of the project based on senior developer background. Efficient communication with several USA and European clients. Point of contact regarding information and requirements gathering. Participating and influencing the Technical flow decision making. Taking part in business development, controlling, organization and negotiations. Managing all specific requests/functional issues and modifications in project specific code. Creating new features using JHipster framework built on Java 8 SE, Spring, Hibernate on the server side, MySQL Database and Angular 7. Tutoring younger developers, organizing bench training sessions, preparing developers for technical interviews. Development and design of user interfaces using AngularJS/Angular 5, TypeScript, HTML, JSP, CSS, Bootstrap. Using DevOps tools such as Jenkins, Jira, GitLab, Open Project. In charge of planning and organizing working activities on the project. Assuring high performance and permanent improvement of the team. Managing technical interviews, onboarding processes of new team members, defining staffing and rotation strategies.

text.text:
Manager and Senior Software Developer - Java Technology

Management of 40+ developers team for insurance software vendor Prima Solutions SA (France) used by some of the most recognized insurance companies such as Allianz, AXA, Societe Generale Insurance etc. Technologies: Java 8 SE, Spring, Hibernate, JDBC, Oracle DB, JavaScript, Dojo JS, AngularJS, Angular 2/5, Bootstrap, HTML/CSS, Tomcat, Jetty, Jenkins. Responsible for development, management, staffing, communication with client’s management, scrum masters, project managers. Taking care of most parts of software life cycle in 5 projects (including one POC for USA market) as developer/manager and 7 more as manager within course of 12 months.
